dataset.description:
Neighborhood businesses and business districts make the City a vibrant place to live. It is important to support the local businesses in our neighborhoods. One of the ways we do this is through Corridor Improvement Districts (CIDs)

Corridor Improvement Authorities oversee Corridor Improvement Districts. CIDs do not raise taxes on property owners. Instead, they use some of the tax dollars already collected from their district. CIDs can use these funds to:

  • Assist the projects and developments supported by their community
  • Sponsor special events
  • Make permanent, one time improvements within a district
dataset.title: Corridor Improvement Districts

dataset.description:
This data set contains ethnicity demographics by census tract in the City of Grand Rapids Corporate limits.

Data was obtained through the United States Census Bureau on March 27, 2019.
dataset.title: ACS 2017 5yrAve - Ethnicity: Hispanic

dataset.description:
This feature host the type and general location of reported offences to the Grand Rapids Police Department. This feature will be updated annually. For more recent offences visit our Crime Mapping application. 

Data includes
  • General location
  • Incident Date
  • Incident Year
  • Reported Date
  • Crime Type
  • Crime Level
Locations are generalized to protect victims of the incidents.
dataset.title: GRPD Historic Crime Locations

dataset.description: A historic district is defined as a significant concentration, linkage or continuity of resources united historically or aesthetically by plan or design. The district’s identity is a result of the interrelationship between individual resources that work together to create a visual sense of its history.
dataset.title: ArcGIS GDBO Historic Districts

dataset.description:
Crash history for the City of Grand Rapids from 2007 to 2017. Updated annually in March to capture past year's data.

dataset.title: CGR Crash Data

dataset.description:
This feature contains health statistics on the City of Grand Rapids. Health statistics were provided through the City Health Dashboard Data. The data is organized by Census Tract. Data is estimated, visit City Health Dashboard for details on data modeling process. .

City Health Dashboard. City Health Dashboard Data. New York: City Health Dashboard; 2018. Available for download at www.cityhealthdashboard.com.

Attribute Details

  • Airpollution: Average daily concentration of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) per cubic meter (average) - range: 2014
  • Bingedrinking: Binge Drinking among adults ages 18 and older (% of total population)
  • ChildreninPov: Children living in households 100% below the federal poverty line (%)
  • Dentalcare: Visits to dentist or dental clinic in the previous year among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)
  • Diabetes: Diabetes among adults over 18 years old (% of total population) - range: 2017
  • MentalDist: Mental health not good for >14 day during the past 30 days among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)
  • PhysicalDist: Physical health not good for >14 days during the past 30 days among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)
  • HighBloodPres: High blood pressure among adults 18 year and older (% of total population)
  • ExHousinCost: Household where more than 30% of household income is spent on housing costs (% of total population)
  • HomeLeadRist: Housing stock with potential elevated lead risks (% of housing stock) - range: 2017
  • IncomeInequal: Households with income at the extremes of the national income distribution (the top 20% or bottom 20%) Index - range: 2017
  • LeadExpIndex: Poverty-adjusted risk of housing based lead exposure (index) - range:  2017
  • LifeExpectanc: Average life expectancy from birth
  • HealthyFood: (% of total population)
  • Obesity: Adult obesity among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)
  • TotPysicalInAct: No leisure-time physical activity in past month among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)
  • PreventSerTot: Adults over 65 years old who are up to date on a core set of clinical preventive services (% of total population)
  • PreventSerMen: Adults over 65 years old who are up to date on a core set of clinical preventive services (% of Males)
  • PreventSerFemale: Adults over 65 years old who are up to date on a core set of clinical preventive services (% of Females)
  • RacialEthnicD: (% of total population)
  • Smoking: Current smoking among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)
  • Unemployment: Current adults under 65 years old who are unemployed (% of total population)
  • Uninsurance: Current lack of health insurance among people aged 0-64 years (% of total population)
dataset.title: GRHealth MultiTheme
